workflow: 1. Handle Popup: If 'Subscribe to Dyson' appears, close it. 2. Menu Check: Click on each link in the main top menu (Deals, Vacuum & wet cleaners, Hair care, Air purifier, Headphones, Lighting, Support) and goto each sub menu and make sure page loaded. make sure there should not be any broken links on any of page. 3. Verification: Ensure each page loads successfully.
